title: Alpha client
body: everytime i try and launch LoL it tells me i need to reinstall Alpha client which i cant seem to do

replies.body: It sounds like the install didn't completely correctly, so you'll have to perform a normal reinstall.  Go over the [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)guide to get league back into its normal state, and from there you can select to reinstall the updated test client if you want.  I hope that helps!
